text: I had no idea my supplements came from sheep’s wool—absolutely shocking
author: Sarah M.

text: Learning the truth made me switch immediately to plant-based Vitamin D3
author: Dr. James K.

text: The process with lanolin disgusted me—pine tree sourcing feels so much cleaner
author: Michael R.

text: Once I discovered the difference, I could never go back to wool-derived D3
author: Emily T.

text: It’s a relief knowing my Vitamin D3 now comes from a pure, plant source
author: David L.
